meanings.definition: Polite or refined in manners or behavior.
meanings.sent1: She always speaks in a genteeler tone when addressing her elders.
meanings.sent2: The genteeler guests at the party mingled with grace and charm.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to act genteeler by delicately sipping its water from a crystal glass.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky in hues of pink and orange, creating a genteeler atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The genteeler music of the violin filled the room with elegance and sophistication.

meanings.definition: More refined or elegant than others in a particular group.
meanings.sent1: Her dress was even genteeler than the rest of the outfits at the event.
meanings.sent2: The mansion on the hill was the genteeler residence in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel thought it was genteeler than the other animals because it had a shiny acorn.
meanings.sent4: The diamond sparkled with a genteeler brilliance than any other gem in the collection.
meanings.sent5: The rose garden was filled with the genteeler fragrance of rare blooms.
